color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

floating.description: Tell QBadge if it should float to the top right side of the relative positioned parent element or not
floating.description_zh: 告诉 QBadge 它是否应该浮动到相对定位的父元素的右上角

transparent.description: Applies a 0.8 opacity; Useful especially for floating QBadge
transparent.description_zh: 应用 0.8 的不透明度;特别适用于浮动 QBadge

multi-line.description: Content can wrap to multiple lines

label.description: Badge's content as string; overrides default slot if specified
label.description_zh: 徽章的内容为字符串;覆盖默认插槽（如果指定）

align.description_zh: 设置垂直对齐的 CSS 属性

outline.description: Use 'outline' design (colored text and borders only)
outline.description_zh: 使用“轮廓”设计（仅限彩色文本和边框）
